name: Onslaught of Fantastical Monsters
description:
Hello! We're Husky Game Development Enterprise over at Michigan Technological University. At the enterprise, we have students create games throughout their semesters with us. Check out all of our students' games!

Onslaught of Fantastical Monsters

Take control of a wizard in a top-down pixel shooter to defend your village from an onslaught of fantastical monsters. Use WASD to move the wizard and aim with the cursor. Pick which spells you want with the number keys corresponding to the numbers on the spell list. To purchase new spells from the shop, click on them when you have enough money. Have fun and try to survive as long as possible. To play, simply unzip the folder and run the executable.

Credits:
